entities.name: SATYA NADELLA
entities.description: Satya Nadella is the Chief Executive Officer of the Company.

entities.name: AMY E. HOOD
entities.description: Amy E. Hood is the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of the Company.

entities.name: ALICE L. JOLLA
entities.description: Alice L. Jolla is the Corporate Vice President and Chief Accounting Officer of the Company.

entities.name: DELOITTE & TOUCHE LLP
entities.description: Deloitte & Touche LLP is an independent registered public accounting firm engaged to audit and render an opinion on the Company's consolidated financial statements and internal control over financial reporting.

entities.name: THE COMPANY
entities.description: The Company is responsible for the preparation of the consolidated financial statements and related information presented in the report, and designs and maintains accounting and internal control systems.

entities.name: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
entities.description: The Board of Directors, through its Audit Committee consisting solely of independent directors, meets periodically with management, internal auditors, and the independent registered public accounting firm to ensure responsibilities are met and to discuss matters concerning internal controls and financial reporting.

relationships.relationship_description: Satya Nadella is the Chief Executive Officer of the Company.
Amy E. Hood is the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of the Company.
Alice L. Jolla is the Corporate Vice President and Chief Accounting Officer of the Company.
Deloitte & Touche LLP is engaged to audit and render an opinion on the Company's consolidated financial statements and internal control over financial reporting.
The Board of Directors, through its Audit Committee, ensures responsibilities are met and discusses matters concerning internal controls and financial reporting.
